query: I would like to have a classifier.
Hi! Please build an ML model that can classify 10 digits with MNIST data. Thanks~
Hello~ I want a deep learning model that can predict a number from an image trained with the MNIST data set.
I would like to get a classifier.
I would like to get a regressor.
I want a model that can classify cat and dog images.
No, only an ML model is enough.
I want a model that can forecast the price of this data.
Not enough, I want a better model.
